intro: I'm a freelance full stack software developer with a passion for web development. I am currently based in India. I do software design and development.
You can have a look at some of my work here.
about: I have been building software for the last six years using technologies like Java,Angular,Docker etc. Understanding problem statements and delivering prompt solutions is my strong suit. Besides work, I like to travel,watch sports, read books and listen to music.
